attributes.comment:
I am in the process of adopting a child from China. We began this process in
November of 2005. As the process slows down more and more each day, we are
waiting for our daughter. Now we learn that we will have to resubmit our
fingerprints at the cost of at least 140.00 and possibly, 160.00, as well as our I-
171H forms too, at the cost of at least almost 600 to the newly proposed 670.00 if
you raise these fees. Please, it reconsider the fee increase or change the lenght
of time the form is good to at least 24 months. We do not have limitless funds to
resubmit form after form. We are just a normal family who would like a child.
Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Loretta A. Lai
